channel.title: A Bit of Help With Aryan
channel.description:
ok so i have been using moparscape for a while now and have manged to learn a few things about how it works i help out with a server my friend runs and all that but there is one thing that always puzzled me why is aryan in there? i mean most servers have such quick leveling that using aryan is pointless. because of this and the fact that by the time that i personally started to try and cheat on runescape aryan had already died. so i never learned how to use it but now for some reason that little aryan button in the menu bar of moparscape has piqued my intrest. i do not know how to load scripts into the integrated aryan moparscape comes with so i am unable to run any of the ones i have. if anyone would be willing to explain how it works or where i might be able to find a good tutorial it would be much appreciated.
Thank You, -Se7eN
In hind sight it may have been better to post this thread in RS2 Server Development/Help but since this had a title of aryan private server scripts i figured i may be fairly relevant to what is being disscused here.

item.title: A Bit of Help With Aryan
item.dc:creator: @Moparisthecoolest Moparisthecoolest
item.description:
@Moparisthecoolest wrote:

You know what, I have the same question as you, but I can’t find even a helpful tutorial. And no one will help me, I mean I haven’t tried on this site yet, but on other sites.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2007, 09:14:18 AM[/size][hr]

Read full topic
item.source: A Bit of Help With Aryan
